title: Baked Apples with Vanilla Custard
ingredients: ['Vanilla Custard', '3 egg yolks', '3 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '350ml milk or more to taste', '1 vanilla pod', 'Baked Apples', '4 large apples', '115g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '250ml apple juice']
